mn120:3.1: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaya samannagato hoti, silena samannagato hoti, sutena samannagato hoti, cagena samannagato hoti, pannaya samannagato hoti.
mn120:3.3: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana khattiyamahasalanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti.
mn120:3.4: So tam cittam dahati, tam cittam adhitthati, tam cittam bhaveti.
mn120:3.5: Tassa te sankhara ca vihara ca evam bhavita evam bahulikata tatrupapattiya samvattanti.
mn120:3.6: Ayam, bhikkhave, maggo ayam patipada tatrupapattiya samvattati.
